translations: 沙文主义的；盲目爱国的

sentences.sentence: My ex-boyfriend Anthony was very chauvinistic.
sentences.translation: 我的前男友安东尼非常之大男子主义。

sentences.sentence: The student who wrote "The A&P as a State of Mind" wisely dropped a paragraph that questioned whether Sammy displays chauvinistic attitudes toward women.
sentences.translation: 写作《A&P：一种心理状态》一文的学生明智地删掉了一段讨论萨米对女性是否有大男子主义倾向的文字。

sentences.sentence: The tribe has been forced to modify its chauvinistic attitudes.
sentences.translation: 部族不得不改变它的沙文主义姿态。
